data.title: And Quiet Flows the Don by Mikhail Sholokhov, Stephen Garry (Translato
data.meta_description: And Quiet Flows the Don or Quietly Flows the Don (Тихий Дон, lit. "The Quiet Don") is a 4-volume epic novel by Russian writer Mikhail Aleksandrovich Sholokhov. The first three volumes were written between 1925-32 and published in the Soviet magazine 'October'. The 4th volume was finished in 1940. The English translatio
